name: @bertero/lerna-semantic-release
description: automated semver compliant package publishing, for lerna
author: Joshua Nelson <jonelson@atlassian.com>, Joscha Feth <jfeth@atlassian.com>

validate-commit-msg.helpMessage: Commit message violates the rules defined for this project. Please, execute `npm run commit` to generate a correct commit message with `commitizen`

scripts.semantic-release: lerna-semantic-release pre && lerna-semantic-release post && lerna-semantic-release perform
scripts.prepush: npm run lint && npm run test
